channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: Engadget Podcast: All about Google I/O and Apple's M1 iPad Pro/iMac
item.description: This week, Cherlynn and Devindra chat with Chris Velazco about the ton of Google I/O new as well as iMac M1 and iPad Pro reviews.

item.title: NASA, ESA and JAXA want to figure out COVID-19's environmental effects
item.description: NASA, the European Space Agency and the Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA) are hosting a hackathon to figure out COVID-19's environmental effect.

item.title: The Morning After: Cleaning with the laser-equipped Dyson V15 Detect
item.description: Today’s headlines: 'Overwatch 2' will change from six- to five-person teams, Snap unveils all-new Spectacles with built-in augmented reality and Belkin's $100 Soundform Connect dongle adds AirPlay 2 to any speaker.

item.title: US Treasury may require crypto transfers over $10K to be reported to the IRS
item.description: The US Treasury Department wants tax payers to report any cryptocurrency transfer worth $10,000 to the Internal Revenue Service.

item.title: Audi is piloting battery-powered EV fast-charging stations
item.description: Audi has unveiled an interesting high-speed "charging hub" concept that will allow EV users to make a reservation for up to 300 kW charging speeds.

item.title: Amazon is retiring Prime Now and moving deliveries into its core app
item.description: Amazon is shifting Prime Now deliveries to its main app and site.

item.title: Clubhouse is now available worldwide on Android
item.description: As promised, Clubhouse has launched worldwide on Android, opening up the app to a lot more potential users.

item.title: California regulator requires most ride-hailing cars to be EVs by 2030
item.description: The California Air Resources Board has approved a mandate requiring most trips on ride-hailing platforms to be in electric vehicles by 2030.

item.title: Google and Qualcomm are making neural network API updates easier on Android
item.description: Instead of waiting for an OS update that may never come, now your Android phone can get AI processing improvements directly from Google.

item.title: Yamaha announces new receivers ready for 8K, 4K/120 and the Xbox Series X
item.description: Yamaha's Aventage receivers are coming home this summer with prices starting at $1,300, but features like 8K/60Hz and 4K/120Hz support won't be available at launch.

item.title: The Dyson V15 Detect's laser proved my apartment was never really clean
item.description: Dyson’s newest vacuum isn’t one for subtlety. It has a laser strapped to the front of it for the purpose of highlighting where your dust is hiding. The Dyson V15 Detect is the company’s newest, top-of-the-line cordless vacuum in its line of stick vacuums, at a cost of $699. Are these high-tech additions gimmicks or truly helpful upgrades for a cleaner home?

item.title: CNA Financial reportedly paid $40 million to resolve a ransomware attack
item.description: US insurance company may have paid one of the most expensive malware ransoms to date.

item.title: 'Overwatch 2' will pit five-person teams against each other
item.description: Overwatch 2 won't arrive until 2022 at the earliest, but it will change the way you play the hero shooter.

item.title: Apple opens affiliate program ahead of podcast subscription launch
item.description: The affiliate program will allow participants to earn a 50 percent commission when converting someone to a paid subscriber.

item.title: Snap's Story Studio is a 'powerful' mobile video editing app
item.description: The company says the app is easy to use and will let you share videos anywhere.

item.title: 'Hocus Pocus 2' will premiere on Disney+ in fall 2022
item.description: It won't be much longer until we get a sequel to cult classic Hocus Pocus.

item.title: Belkin's $100 Soundform Connect dongle adds AirPlay 2 to any speaker
item.description: The $100 Soundform Connect turns any traditional speaker into an AirPlay 2-compatible smart speaker you can cast audio to from an iPhone, iPad, Mac or Apple TV.

item.title: Snap unveils all-new Spectacles with built-in augmented reality
item.description: Snapchat just showed off its long rumored augmented reality-enabled Spectacles.

item.title: Snapchat's camera can 'scan' outfits to help you shop
item.description: Snap unveiled a slew of updates that will change how creators and brands use the service, including a new AR "try-on" feature, and "gifting" for creators.

item.title: Snapchat shows off new AR features and more ‘inclusive’ camera tech
item.description: Snap showed off new AR features, announced partnerships with YouTube, and previewed a new more “inclusive” version of its cameras technology.

item.title: 'Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart' will let you slow down the action up to 70 percent
item.description: Sony has revealed extensive accessibility options for its next big PS5 exclusive.

item.title: Storytel audiobooks are coming to Spotify later this year
item.description: Starting later this year, Spotify will allow Storytel subscribers to link their accounts to Spotify.

item.title: Omaze is doing an all-Apple sweepstakes
item.description: Omaze is giving away a bundle of Apple products when you enter to win any one of three electric car sweepstakes.

item.title: Spotify adds handy search filters to its mobile apps
item.description: They should get you to the music and podcasts you’re looking for a bit faster.

item.title: Epic's Mega Sale is back with discounts, coupons and a free copy of 'NBA 2K21'
item.description: The Epic Games Store's Mega Sale is back, and so is the Epic Coupon.
